html:
1.27.25  6:18 pm   What conspiracies are real

      leap years

1.27.25  5:47 pm   Yeah but WHY are there so many mistakes in song texts on the internet?

      at this point they're just showing off

1.27.25  5:21 pm   What is your preferred number of elephants in a room

      maybe a handful

1.27.25  2:34 pm   Is $19.99 the best price?

      no

1.27.25  12:42 pm   any tips for the stock market??

      there's real businesses somewhere under there

1.27.25  12:22 pm   just got a new piano, i've made songs before but only using online tools and programs and whenever I try to do something on the piano it just sounds like i'm pressing random keys and hoping it sounds good (because i literally am), any tips?

      this may be a long shot, but do you have any memory of how you learned to talk

1.27.25  11:46 am   Are you a human being?

      oh man, that would explain some of those cheeseburger cravings

1.27.25  10:52 am   do you like tables? if so what is your favorite type of table?

      i like tables that are also chairs

1.27.25  10:47 am   is it quicker to go to chicago, or by train?

      neither

1.27.25  6:47 am   opinions on the word A?

      "it just works"

1.27.25  4:44 am   Do you believe, that all the languages in the world evolved from a single proto-language?

      not necessarily

1.27.25  4:23 am   good morning lots of good things happen every day.  and this is just the beginning

      fair enough

1.27.25  2:04 am   why do you think greek letters are commonly used in math?

      maybe tradition. historically the greeks were kind of the kings of math

1.26.25  11:35 pm   Opinion on the number seven.

      extremely popular

1.26.25  11:09 pm   what do you think of the like, really long comments that try to interpret your music?

     not the exact same thought for every comment

     Do intend your songs have certain interpretations?

     a variety of interpretations would be healthy. otherwise there's no need to even venture into the business of creativity

1.26.25  11:08 pm   Is love nothing more than hopeless misery?

      that seems incorrect at best

1.26.25  10:54 pm   i'm just mad that joe satrioni can put superglue on his fingertips and play guitar all night but there's nothing you can do about trumpet endurance, after a certain threshold. even pros can start to sound a little "croaky" at the end of a demanding gig, to a discerning ear. i tried the elmers glue stick. i couldn't help myself. nothing awful happened to me but it sure didn't help (pretty sure it made the sound worse, which in retrospect should have been pretty obvious). fuck.........!

      it's not necessarily a bad idea for horn players to also have some skills with some of the hands-only instruments. for many reasons

1.26.25  10:20 pm   David lynch said that ideas come to you like fish. They are not a product you create, rather you are lucky to have them; they are like gifts, and then must put in the work to realise them. Curious what you might think about this. 

      it seems like all artists, writers, anyone who does creative work, has noticed this sort of phenomenon

1.26.25  10:18 pm   do you intentionally leave motifs in your songs?

      maybe i am understanding the word 'motif' incorrectly, but, for example, if you had said "an Elvis motif" i would think that means, like, "an Elvis thing"...... so from that standpoint it appears as though you are asking me if i put things in my songs. on the off chance that that is what you meant, then the answer is a resounding yes

1.26.25  10:06 pm   how do you make frozen yogurt

      i have no idea. i don't even know what yogurt is, really. additionally, i'm not entirely sure if frozen yogurt has anything to do with yogurt. it may, it may not, i just don't know

1.26.25  9:52 pm   is it chill if i make this question about me?

      sure

1.26.25  9:32 pm   What's your opinion on breaking rules?

      sometimes it's the only way to prove you're alive

1.26.25  8:59 pm   what is the meaning of everything

      everything

1.26.25  8:48 pm   why is it so hard to do music when you want to do it a certain way? why is it like herding a cat meow

      precisely because it's alive

1.26.25  8:22 pm   do you use a daily planner

      no

1.26.25  7:58 pm   thoughts on crystal geyser

      most people probably assume that the bottled water 'crystal geyser' is named after the actual geyser ('crystal geyser') in Utah, but we must not rule out the possibility that it could be the other way around

1.26.25  7:01 pm   do you like to party

      technically yes

1.26.25  6:56 pm   i decided a while ago to start writing down my thoughts whenever i have them (kinda like the notebook section here) and i just finished my first journal. rereading the earlier pages now makes me feel like i am back at the exact moment i wrote it. do you also feel this way when rereading old thoughts/ideas/etc

      a little bit

1.26.25  6:46 pm   Any thoughts on the word 'ineffable'?

      makes me immediately wonder how to eff something

1.26.25  6:02 pm   Do you have fidget toy recommendations

      how about planet earth

1.26.25  4:55 pm   do you have an opinion on yes (band) do you at least think some of their songs are "at least ok"

      the only one i can think of is 'owner of a lonely heart' which does a number of things that i find fairly strong

1.26.25  3:25 pm   favorite song

      i still haven't found one, but i'm doing some experiments

1.26.25  2:50 pm   if you had to come up with a way to leave your lover to add to the list (getting it a little closer to 50) what would it be

      go down to the mall, paul. and you'll never guess the name of the company who probably owns the mall

1.26.25  2:25 pm   opinion about pi (math)

      it's a souvenir of the particular way our spatial world is laid out

1.26.25  1:50 pm   what toppings go best on a hot dog

      a slice of cheese

1.26.25  12:44 pm   is there a way you'd recommend improving memory? i've done flash cards but that only makes me remember the stuff on the flash cards better, not necessarily the stuff i don't yet know i will want/need to remember.

      sometimes you can tell yourself, it doesn't matter whether you 'remember' it, it's still true. that makes it more real, and then your mind can find it more easily

1.26.25  11:45 am   does more effort always equal better result?

      absolutely not

1.26.25  10:03 am   every tried pomodoro technique? 

      i've done something similar

1.26.25  8:51 am   so, how are you liking these questions so far

      pretty good even though it's all spongebob

1.26.25  7:50 am   what's your opinion on bumblebees

      i only know them from the cartoons

1.26.25  5:30 am   Would you learn a non-Indo-European language?

      oh hell yeah

1.26.25  5:22 am   Who is the worst member of bill wurtz band?

      me

1.26.25  3:27 am   What artform have you made the least of? Would you consider trying to make more of whatever that is?

      the deeper you get into artforms the less you can tell where the lines are between the artforms

1.26.25  2:48 am   hi bill, I just bought a property in egypt

      oh small world

1.26.25  2:36 am   Do you have any big goals?

      yes

1.26.25  1:13 am   i want to consistently upload videos. but i'm more resistant to uploading shitty content than i am excited to practice content creation. how do i tip the scale so i'm more excited than i am resistant?

      find a safe space where the pursuit is justified, if nothing else, in the name of the avant garde

1.26.25  12:43 am   does it get worse before it gets better?

      sometimes but not always

1.26.25  12:21 am   thoughts on fanfiction of actors/celebrities?

      too real

1.25.25  11:13 pm   which is better air fryers or toaster ovens

      they are both better than each other. you can show this using lorentz transformations

1.25.25  10:02 pm   do you think that at least one goose is aware of the existence of the sega dreamcast

      i don't see why not
